endpoints.description: Submit client details to receive a calculated risk score and suggestions.
Retrieve the previously calculated risk score for a specific client.
Add a new client profile with relevant financial information.
Retrieve details of a specific client profile.
Update existing client profile data with newer information.
Analyze trends and statistics over accumulated risk scores.
Retrieve detailed recommended lending terms for a specific client.
Remove a specific client profile from the system.
Receive insights into algorithm performance and reliability metrics.
Submit data usage for compliance verification as per legal requirements.
